pinyin: er4 liu2 ji1 hu3 po4 suan1 na4

sentences.english: Through the dark robe oft amber rays prevail.
sentences.chinese: 琥珀色光線穿過黑袍而透射。

sentences.english: An older wine should be making progress toward the amber end of the spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 一款老酒應該會變化到琥珀色在色譜的另一端。

sentences.english: Luminescent amber eyes were fringed with long, dark lashes.
sentences.chinese: 琥珀色的眼睛，在長黑的劉海下，閃爍光芒。

sentences.english: The amber which was selected had a beautiful yellow-brown color like honey.
sentences.chinese: 被挑選的琥珀有着像蜂蜜一樣漂亮的黃棕色。

sentences.english: But when the light hits them they change to amber.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果有光照在上面就會變成琥珀色。

sentences.english: The older man was buried with jade and amber collars and bracelets and pearl ornaments.
sentences.chinese: 年長的男子的殉葬品有玉器琥珀項圈手鐲，珍珠飾品。

sentences.english: A gas chromatographic technique tor the analisys of sodium succinate has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 用氣相色譜法測定眼藥水中琥珀酸鈉的含量。

sentences.english: Andyou are pure beside me as a sleeping amber.
sentences.chinese: 你在我身後純潔的像一枚正在沉睡的琥珀。

sentences.english: Electrostatic water treatment can significantly increase the scale inhibition performance of PESA.
sentences.chinese: 靜電水處理能顯著提高聚環氧琥珀酸的阻垢性能。

sentences.english: After that , what happened to the Amber Room remains a mystery .
sentences.chinese: 從那以後，琥珀屋的去處便成了一個謎。

sentences.english: Her amber eyes and her alto voice were comfort to him.
sentences.chinese: 她琥珀色的眼睛和女低音對他是一種安慰。

sentences.english: Intramuscular succinylcholine does not provide satisfactory tracheal intubating condition in infants with congenital heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 肌注琥珀膽鹼不能提供有效的肌松作用和插管條件。

sentences.english: In 1770 the room was completed the way she wanted.
sentences.chinese: 1770年，這間琥珀屋按照她的要求完成了。

sentences.english: Amber has a beautiful yellow-brown colour.
sentences.chinese: 琥珀色彩豔麗，呈黃褐色。

sentences.english: Thy coral clasps and amber studs.
sentences.chinese: 珊瑚的扣子和琥珀紐的晶彩。

sentences.english: Deep red with hints of purple and ambers.
sentences.chinese: 深紅色澤，而略帶輕微的紫和琥珀色彩。

definition: red coral/precious coral (Corallium rubrum and several related species of marine coral)
Karakax County in Hotan Prefecture 和田地區|和田地区[He2 tian2 Di4 qu1], Xinjiang
jade/jade and stone/(fig.) the good and the bad
